articles.title: Inaugural Ceremony of Sci-Tech Complex Held in Presence of Kim Jong Un
articles.content:
Inaugural Ceremony of Sci-Tech Complex Held in Presence of Kim Jong Un
 Pyongyang, January 2 (KCNA) -- There took place an inaugural ceremony of the Sci-Tech Complex with splendor in the presence of supreme leader Kim Jong Un on Friday, New Year's Day. 
					 Pak Pong Ju, member of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea and premier of the Cabinet, made an address. 
					
					 He said the complex is the center for disseminating latest science and technology provided by the Workers' Party of Korea in the 21st century, the age of knowledge-based economy. 
					
					 The complex is a magnificent edifice for all the people's study meeting diverse purposes to be proud of in the world and an icon of the Juche-oriented architectural art in the great era of Kim Jong Un, he stressed. 
					
					 Our people came to have another seat of learning meeting the requirements of a highly civilized socialist nation as the world's best center for disseminating science and technology has been built not only for scientists and technicians but also for other people. 
					
					 Amid the playing of the welcome music Kim Jong Un cut the inaugural tape. 
					
					 At the end of the ceremony he went round the complex together with senior officials of the party, state and army. 
					
					 Going round the interior of the complex, he said this is a great center for all-people study and one for disseminating latest science and technology in which the party's plan has been materialized. He said meaningful words that the first gate to the New Year to greet the 7th Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea has been opened with science.
					
					 He called for operating well the operation of the complex, the precious wealth of the country, and greatly contributing to making all the people well versed in science and technology, turning the DPRK into a power of science and technology and developing it into a talented nation.
					
					 He underscored the need for the scientific field to firmly build up forces for developing science and technology, boost creative cooperation among scientists and researchers and widely generalize the successes and experience gained and thus steadily develop the nation's science and technology.
					
					 He stressed the need for the agricultural sector to make a dynamic technological revolution, apply scientific farming methods, increase the proportion of mechanization in farm work and, at the same time, launch a high-pitched drive for putting farming and stock-breeding on a scientific basis.
					
					 He underlined the need for the field of education to steadily push forward the work for improving conditions and environment for education in the age of knowledge-based economy and thus train huge ranks of talents who will play important roles in bringing earlier the building of a socialist economic power. 
					
					 Present at the ceremony were Hwang Pyong So, Pak Pong Ju, Kim Ki Nam, Choe Thae Bok, O Su Yong, Ro Tu Chol, officials of the army and society, service personnel, builders and helpers who took part in the construction of the complex, officials and employees of the complex, officials of ministries, national institutions, those of institutions and enterprises, and scientists, educators, youth and students and other working people in Pyongyang.

articles.title: DPRK People Enjoy New Year's Day
articles.content:
DPRK People Enjoy New Year's Day
 Pyongyang, January 2 (KCNA) -- The citizens in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea are replete with joy and happiness, greeting the new year Juche 105.
					 Streets and villages across the country were crowded with citizens enjoying happy New Year's Day.
					
					 In the capital city of Pyongyang many people visited the Kumsusan Palace of the Sun and the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il to pay floral tributes to them.
					
					 Art performances were given at theaters and cultural houses in Pyongyang and local areas to delight the citizens on New Year's Day.
					
					 There were also folklore amusement games of working citizens and schoolchildren, such as yut-game, kite-flying and shuttlecock game, adding to festive mood. Kites, flown by schoolchildren, were carrying letters reading "Thriving Korea", "Socialist civilization" and "Happiness".
					
					 Public catering establishments served traditional foods as well as grilled roe deer and noodles with minced pheasant meat, while Munsu Water Park, Mirim Riding Club and other sports and cultural establishments were packed with visitors.
					
					 On the evening of Friday, the first of the year, fireworks were displayed in Pyongyang. Enjoying the fireworks, citizens expressed their deep gratitude to supreme leader Kim Jong Un who has worked heart and soul for the country's prosperity and the people's welfare.

articles.title: DPRK People Determined to Make Rapid Progress This Year
articles.content:
DPRK People Determined to Make Rapid Progress This Year
 Pyongyang, January 2 (KCNA) -- The working citizens in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea have turned out in a drive to carry out the tasks set forth by supreme leader Kim Jong Un in his New Year address.
					 In the New Year address, Kim Jong Un advanced a militant slogan "Let us usher in a golden age in building a thriving nation this year when the Seventh Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea is to be held!". And he stressed that all efforts should be directed to building an economic power and a fresh turn should be effected in the development of economy and the improvement of the people's living standard.
					
					 In hearty response to his New Year address, all officials and workers in different economic fields, including power industry, railway transport, metal and coal industries and agriculture, are striving to bring production upswing, with a strong will to display the spirit and mettle of Korea again this year. 
					
					 They are firmly determined to launch a general offensive in a big way so as to turn the country into an economic giant and drastically improve the people's living standard.

articles.title: Minju Joson Blasts S. Korean Authorities' Act of Treachery
articles.content:
Minju Joson Blasts S. Korean Authorities' Act of Treachery
 Pyongyang, January 2 (KCNA) -- As already reported, both south Korea and Japan published that they reached a unanimous agreement on the "issue of 'comfort women' for the Imperial Japanese Army" at the foreign ministers' talks held in Seoul on Dec. 28 last year.
					 Commenting on this Minju Joson Saturday says that if the issue of the comfort women for the Imperial Japanese Army is to find a final solution,  Japan should admit the state and legal responsibility for it and make an official apology and honest reparation for it.
					
					 The commentary goes on:
					
					 At the recent talks the Japanese foreign minister only conveyed the chief executive's shameful words of "apology and reflection" on the above-said issue and promised to provide a petty amount of fund in aid.
					
					 This indicates that the Japanese authorities took this action not from the bottom of their hearts but it was a cynical ploy employed by them as they were hit hard from all sides for their acts of distorting history and falsifying truth.
					
					 The south Korean reactionaries are busy building up public opinion that the above-said issue has been fully settled, chiming in with the Japanese reactionaries but their behavior only brings to light their true colors as pro-Japanese lackeys.
					
					 What should not be overlooked is the fact that the recent talks were held according to the U.S. scenario to knock into shape a triangular military alliance involving the U.S., Japan and south Korea.
					
					 The U.S. is now highly appreciating the talks, "hailing them as a very gratifying event." It is busy prodding its stooges to the formation of the triangular military alliance under the pretext of "nuclear threat from the north". The south Korean authorities are involved in the U.S. moves to bring the dark clouds of a nuclear war to hang over the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 All these facts go to prove that the south Korean authorities are group of traitors who are utterly indifferent to the destiny of the nation.

articles.title: Pomminryon South Headquarters Protest against Shut-down of Its Website
articles.content:
Pomminryon South Headquarters Protest against Shut-down of Its Website
 Pyongyang, January 2 (KCNA) -- The South Headquarters of the Pan-National Alliance for Korea's Reunification (Pomminryon) on Dec. 29 last year condemned the south Korean conservative authorities' step to forcibly shut down its website.
					 The Headquarters said its website was shut down on Dec. 28 by the decision of the media screening committee at the request of the Intelligence Service.
					
					 The Headquarters branded the Intelligence Service and the media screening committee's acts of suppressing the freedom of thought, conscience and expression as actions against democracy and reunification. 
					
					 The Headquarters declared it would launch a legal action such as filing a suit in protest against the forcible shutdown of its website.

articles.title: South Korea's Humiliating Diplomacy towards Japan Flailed
articles.content:
South Korea's Humiliating Diplomacy towards Japan Flailed
 Pyongyang, January 2 (KCNA) -- Son Se Yong, a member of the editorial board of Minjok Thongsin, an internet newspaper of Koreans in the U.S., released a commentary critical of the south Korean conservative group's acts of treachery.
					 The commentary said:
					
					 Defying objections of victims of the sexual slavery, the south Korean and Japanese authorities made public the "agreement" on the issue of the sexual slavery and the U.S. authorities are clapping in welcome of the "agreement".
					
					 The present chief executive of south Korea would be well advised to make a heartfelt apology to the people, though belatedly, and step down as soon as possible.

articles.title: South Korean Authorities' Humiliating Diplomacy towards Japan Blasted by Media
articles.content:
South Korean Authorities' Humiliating Diplomacy towards Japan Blasted by Media
 Pyongyang, January 2 (KCNA) -- South Korean online paper Voice of People on Dec. 29 last year in an editorial lambasted the authorities' humiliating attitude in tackling the issue of the sexual slavery for the Imperial Japanese Army.
					 The south Korean authorities and Japan struck a deal on the issue of the above-said issue on Dec. 28 but Japan has nothing to lose and has little difference from the former stance, the editorial said, and went on:
					
					 Japan didn't make clear its legal and moral responsibility for the sexual slavery and omitted the expression of coercion involved.
					
					 In the "agreement", the essence of the above-said issue- that was a state-organized crime- was not mentioned.
					
					 Even international human rights organizations described the agreement as a political deal of Japan for evading its responsibility.
					
					 The humiliating "agreement" was the outcome of yielding to the U.S. pressure for knocking triangular military alliance into shape, the editorial noted, asking what nationality the authorities who inked the "agreement" are.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Exploits Praised by Nigerian Organization
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Exploits Praised by Nigerian Organization
 Pyongyang, January 2 (KCNA) -- The Nigerian National Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism posted on its website an article titled "Supreme commander Kim Jong Un, iron-willed commander" on Dec. 25 last year on the 4th anniversary of his assumption of the supreme commandership of the Korean People's Army (KPA).
					 The article said that the world watched the outstanding supreme commander firmly protecting not only the security of the country and its people but the regional peace and stability by bolstering up the country's military muscle as firm as a rock. It went on:
					
					 He has made ceaseless journeys for Songun leadership since he inspected the Seoul Ryu Kyong Su Guards 105th Tank Division of the KPA honored with the Title of O Jung Hup-led 7th Regiment on Jan. 1, 2012.
					
					 Well versed in the cutting-edge military science and technology and hardware, he has paid great attention to developing the national defence industry.
					
					 The Workers' Party of Korea set forth a new line of simultaneously developing the two fronts at the March 2013 Plenary Meeting of the WPK Central Committee and the DPRK legally guaranteed the country's status as a nuclear and space power at the Seventh Session of the 12th Supreme People's Assembly, remarkably bolstering up the war deterrent of the DPRK which no one can provoke.
					
					 Kim Jong Un has fully demonstrated the unparalleled spirit and pluck as an iron-willed commander in the course of foiling the reckless nuclear threat and blackmail of the U.S. and its vassals and shattering their war moves.
					
					 Under his leadership, the soldier-builders built a lot of structures for people such as the Munsu Water Park, Mirim Riding Club, Masikryong Ski Resort, etc.

articles.title: Kim Jong Suk's Birth Anniversary Observed by Int'l Organization
articles.content:
Kim Jong Suk's Birth Anniversary Observed by Int'l Organization
 Pyongyang, January 2 (KCNA) -- The Korean Friendship Association headquartered in Spain posted a special write-up on its homepage on the occasion of the 98th birth anniversary of anti-Japanese war hero Kim Jong Suk on Dec. 21 last year.
					 Seen on the website were articles titled "Songun revolutionary exploits of Kim Jong Suk", "Kim Jong Suk's life" and "Her wishes" illustrated with her photos of accompanying President Kim Il Sung.
					
					 The articles said that she was a great revolutionary and ardent patriot who devoted her all to the safety of Kim Il Sung during the anti-Japanese armed struggle and made great contributions to liberating Korea and building a new country, adding:
					
					 Her greatest exploit was that she brought up leader Kim Jong Il to be a successor to Kim Il Sung.
					
					 Her revolutionary life will shine forever along with the thriving DPRK.

articles.title: DPRK's Important Days Marked Abroad
articles.content:
DPRK's Important Days Marked Abroad
 Pyongyang, January 2 (KCNA) -- Meetings and lectures took place in Russia, Nigeria and India on December 25 and 26 last year to mark the 24th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's assumption of the supreme commandership of the Korean People's Army and the fourth anniversary of Marshal Kim Jong Un's assumption of the supreme commandership of the KPA. 
					 The chairman of the Maritime Territorial Regional branch of the Youth Guards under the United Russia Party said the DPRK emerged a powerful country despite of the persistent moves of the U.S. to stifle it and this proves that the path explored by President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il and along which they led the people was the one of victory and glory. 
					
					 The chairman of the Control Committee of the Maritime Territorial Regional branch of the Youth Guards under the United Russia Party declared that he would fully support the Korean people in their struggle to defend genuine peace and beautiful future of mankind from the U.S. bringing war and trouble to the world. 
					
					 The chairman of the Nigerian Group for the Study of the Songun Politics in his lecture said Kim Jong Un's way of creation has gone beyond the world level and his sphere of creation is vast and all-inclusive, indeed.

articles.title: Kim Jong Suk's Exploits Praised in Russia, Nigeria
articles.content:
Kim Jong Suk's Exploits Praised in Russia, Nigeria 
 Pyongyang, January 2 (KCNA) -- Special write-ups were posted on homepages of Russia and Nigeria on December 18 and 21 last year to mark the 98th birth anniversary of anti-Japanese war hero Kim Jong Suk. 
					 Seen on an Irkutsk homepage of Russia was an article illustrated with photos of Kim Jong Suk which said that she embarked upon the road of the struggle to save the destiny of the country and the nation in her teens and took part in many battles till Korea was liberated, earning the fame as woman commander of the anti-Japanese war. 
					
					 It recalled that Kim Jong Suk defended President Kim Il Sung at the risk of her life and performed great exploits in the battles during the anti-Japanese war. 
					
					 The internet website of the Nigerian National Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism said in an article that it was the greatest exploit of Kim Jong Suk that she devotedly defended Kim Il Sung in the battles. 
					
					 There were many critical moments when Kim Il Sung was targeted by troops and policemen of the Japanese imperialists during the period of the hard-fought anti-Japanese armed struggle, it said, adding:
					
					 In those moments she protected Kim Il Sung as a human shield. 
					
					 It was also her feat that she displayed matchless pluck, superb strategy, marksmanship never missing any target, distinguished bravery and self-sacrificing spirit. 
					
					 She also performed great exploits by arousing people from all walks of life to the sacred war for the liberation of Korea through her skillful and tested political underground activities. 
					
					 The exploits of anti-Japanese war hero Kim Jong Suk will always be remembered not only by the Korean people but also by the world progressives.

articles.title: Removal of Concrete Wall Dividing Korea Demanded in UK
articles.content:
Removal of Concrete Wall Dividing Korea Demanded in UK
 Pyongyang, January 2 (KCNA) -- The British Association for the Study of Songun Policy, the British Group for the Study of the Juche Idea and the Korean Friendship Association UK made public a joint statement demanding the removal of the concrete wall dividing Korea on December 25. 
					 It said that 36 years ago the south Korean authorities built the high concrete wall dividing Korea along the area south of the Military Demarcation Line at the prodding of the U.S. to perpetuate the division of Korea. 
					
					 It divided eight counties, 122 villages, three main railways, three highways and at least 220 minor, it noted.
					
					 It said the concrete wall is a symbol of Korea's division and evidence proving atrocities of the U.S. imperialists and the south Korean authorities who imposed sufferings resulting from the national division upon the Korean people. 
					
					 Noting that behind this concrete wall the U.S. and south Korea stage war exercises for aggression against the DPRK every year, it stressed that the progressive organizations in UK and mankind demand the U.S. and the south Korean authorities pull down the concrete wall at once.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Introduced in Poland
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Introduced in Poland
 Pyongyang, January 2 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il's work "On Strengthening the People's Army and Establishing the Social Habit of Attaching Importance to Military Affairs" was posted by the Polish Branch of the Korean Friendship Association on its website on Dec. 16 last year.
					 His photo was seen on the website.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un participa en acto inaugural de Complejo de Ciencias y Tecnicas
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un participa en acto inaugural de Complejo de Ciencias y Tecnicas
Pyongyang, 2 de enero (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia primero la ceremonia inaugural del Complejo de Ciencias y Tecnicas con la participacion del Mariscal Kim Jong Un.
					El Mariscal salio al lugar del acto.
					
					El discurso inaugural estuvo a cargo de Pak Pong Ju, miembro del Buro Politico del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y primer ministro del Consejo de Ministros.
					
					El orador dijo que el complejo deviene el centro de divulgacion de ciencias y tecnicas sofisticadas ofrecido por el Partido del Trabajo de Corea a nuestro pueblo en el siglo XXI, epoca de la economia basada en los conocimientos, y prosiguio:
					
					El palacio es un gran centro multifuncional de estudio de todo el pueblo, digno de enorgullecerse al mundo, y el modelo del autoctono arte arquitectonico de la gran epoca de Kim Jong Un.
					
					Gracias a la edificacion de la base de divulgacion de ciencias y tecnicas de maximo nivel del mundo en que pueden estudiar a sus anchas no solo los cientificos y tecnicos sino tambien todas las personas, el pueblo coreano pudo tener otro palacio de estudio apto al prestigio del pais civilizado socialista.
					
					En medio de sonar la cancion de bienvenida, el Mariscal corto la cinta de inauguracion.
					
					Terminado el acto, el Mariscal recorrio el complejo junto con los cuadros directivos del partido, el Estado y el ejercito.
					
					Al dar vuelta al interior del palacio, senalo que esto es precisamente el gran palacio de estudio de todo el pueblo y base divulgadora de ciencias y tecnicas sofisticadas en que se materializo el ideal del partido y dio las instrucciones significativas de que se abrio con ciencias la primera puerta del ano nuevo en que se celebrara el Septimo Congreso del PTC.
					
					Puntualizo la necesidad de llevar bien la gestion del complejo, valioso patrimonio del pais, para hacer aporte a la formacion a todos los ciudadanos como excelentes cientificos y tecnicos y la construccion de la potencia cientifico-tecnologia y la de talentos.
					
					Destaco que en la rama cientifica hay que preparar firmemente las fuerzas para desarrollar las ciencias y tecnicas, fortalecer la cooperacion creativa de los cientificos e investigadores y generalizar ampliamente los exitos y las experiencias logrados, de manera que tienen que desarrollar incesantemente las ciencias y tecnicas del pais.
					
					Acoto que a la rama agricola le corresponden desplegar con dinamismo la revolucion tecnica, introducir los metodos agricolas cientificos, elevar la mecanizacion de las faenas agricolas y levantar furiosamente las llamaradas de la agricultura y ganaderia basadas en las ciencias.
					
					Continuo que hoy en dia, epoca de la economia de conocimiento, el sector educacional debe desarrollar ininterrumpidamente la labor por renovar la condicion y el ambiente pedagogicos para preparar un mar de los talentosos capaces de cumplir un gran rol en adelantar la construccion de la potencia economica socialista.
					
					Tomaron parte en el acto Hwang Pyong So, Pak Pong Ju, Kim Ki Nam, Choe Thae Bok, O Su Yong, Ro Tu Chol, los funcionarios del ejercito y la sociedad, los uniformados del EPC, constructores y voluntarios quienes tomaron parte en la construccion, funcionarios y empleados del Complejo, cientificos, educadores, jovenes, estudiantes y trabajadores de los ministerios, organos centrales, instituciones y empresas capitalinas.

articles.title: Tiene lugar funcion de escolares por Ano Nuevo
articles.content:
Tiene lugar funcion de escolares por Ano Nuevo
Pyongyang, 2 de enero (ACNC) -- Con motivo del Ano Nuevo 105 (2016) de la Era Juche, tuvo lugar la vispera en el Palacio de Escolares y Ninos de Mangyongdae la funcion de ninos escolares "No envidiamos nada a nadie en el mundo".
					La vieron Kim Yong Nam, Pak Pong Ju, Kim Ki Nam, Choe Thae Bok y otros, Kim Yong Dae, presidente del Comite Central del Partido Social-Democrata de Corea, Jon Yong Nam, presidente del Comite Central de la Union de la Juventud Socialista Kim Il Sung, los funcionarios del Consejo de Ministros, ministerios y organos centrales junto con los participantes en la 3a reunion de los activistas de la rama pesquera del EPC, los funcionarios y los innovadores laborales de varias unidades inclusive el Complejo de Locomotoras Electricas Kim Jong Thae y la Piscifactoria de Siluros de Pyongyang, los cientificos, los profesores, los deportistas, los entrenadores, los matriculados de la Escuela Revolucionaria de Mangyongdae y la Escuela Revolucionaria Kang Pan Sok, los ninos escolares y los integrantes de la UJS en esta capital.
					
					Fueron invitados los matrimonios de representantes diplomaticos y de organizaciones internacionales y los de agregados militares acreditados en Corea, el representante de la sucursal del Frente Democratico Nacional Antiimperialista en Pyongyang, y los compatriotas quienes permanecen en la patria. 
					
					En la funcion iniciada con el prologo "Dia mas alegre gracias a contar con el Estimado Mariscal", los ejecutantes dieron reverencia de ano nuevo al Mariscal Kim Jong Un deseando buena salud. 
					
					En la escena se pusieron variadas piezas inclusive el solo y coro "Mi cancion resonara en todo el mundo", la cancion y baile "El Generalisimo bailo junto con nosotros", el coro "El General y los ninos", el baile deportivo "Palacio de Escolares y Ninos de Mangyongdae, regazo del sol", el baile adaptado el cuento hecho por el Generalisimo Kim Jong Il "El erizo que vencio al tigre", la narracion de musica y baile de los ninos coreanos residentes en Japon "Diario de alumno de la escuela coreana" y el quinteto de baile "Sentimiento patriotico es tambien cinco puntos".
					
					La narracion oral "Nuestra casa", el baile "Es fascinante el campismo de esqui" y "Jugadores de nuestra clase de futbol" el circo "Mirenme" demostraron bien el aspecto alegre de los ninos escolares que gozan de todas las civilizaciones socialistas.
					
					Algunas piezas recibieron la efusiva ovacion de los espectadores.
					
					La funcion termino con el epilogo "Siempre seguiremos al partido" y "Marchemos hacia el futuro con la bendicion del Mariscal".

articles.title: Se disparan en Pyongyang fuegos artificiales por Ano Nuevo 2016
articles.content:
Se disparan en Pyongyang fuegos artificiales por Ano Nuevo 2016
Pyongyang, 2 de enero (ACNC) -- En ocasion del Ano Nuevo 105(2016) de la Era Juche, tuvo lugar en esta capital el disparo de fuegos artificiales.
					A las 21:00 del dia primero, las salvas de distintos colores adornaron de manera encantadora el cielo nocturno.
					
					Con el ritmo de las canciones "Caiga la nieve del Ano Nuevo", "Jubilo del pueblo", "Mi patria llena de esperanzas", "Corramos hacia el futuro", "Cancion del pueblo bendito" y otras canciones la lluvia de chispas redoblo la alegria y jubilo de los militares y civiles que acogen el Ano Nuevo.
					
					El disparo de los fuegos artificiales por el Ano Nuevo conmovio mucho a los trabajadores, jovenes y estudiantes decididos a crear brillantes milagros y meritos en la marcha de gran auge hacia mayo de victoria.

articles.title: Minju Joson revela naturaleza traidora pro-japonesa de autoridades surcoreanas
articles.content:
Minju Joson revela naturaleza traidora pro-japonesa de autoridades surcoreanas
Pyongyang, 2 de enero (ACNC) -- Segun trascendidos, quedo publicado el hecho de que se llego a un "acuerdo" en cuanto al "problema de ´consoladoras´ para el viejo ejercito japones" en las conservaciones entre los cancilleres del Sur de Corea y Japon, efectuadas en Seul el 28 de diciembre del ano pasado.
					Para resolver totalmente el problema de las esclavas sexuales para las tropas japonesas, el pais isleno debe pedir disculpa oficial y hacer indemnizacion estricta tras reconocer la responsabilidad estatal y legal.
					
					Asi insiste el periodico Minju Joson en un comentario individual divulgado el dia 2 y continua:
					
					Pero, esta vez Japon transmitio las avergonzadas palabras del actual gobernador japones quien fingio expresar el alma de la "disculpa y reflexion" sobre el problema de esclavas sexuales para las tropas japonesas, y decidio brindar ayuda con pequena cantidad de dinero.
					
					Esto insinua que la presente medida no parte de la sinceridad de las autoridades japonesas sino de artimana tramada al ser condenadas sus maniobras destinadas a  tergiversar la historia.
					
					Las autoridades surcoreanas sumisas a los reaccionarios japoneses desvian la opinion publica como si hubiera solucionado totalmente el problema de esclavas sexuales para las tropas japonesas, asi que ponen al desnudo por si mismas su naturaleza traidora pro-japonesa.
					
					Lo que no puede pasar por alto es que las presentes conversaciones fueron organizadas segun el guion del imperialismo norteamericano que intenta establecer la alianza militar tripartita EE.UU.-Japon-el Sur de Corea.
					
					Ahora, EE.UU. "aplaude" las conversaciones diciendo que es una "cosa muy satisfecha", mientras incita a sus dos lacayos a la fabricacion de la alianza militar tripartita hablando de la "amenaza nuclear del Norte de Corea".
					
					Asi que el Sur de Corea se suma a las maniobras de EE.UU. destinadas a estallar en la Peninsula Coreana la guerra nuclear.
					
					La realidad demuestra fehacientemente que las autoridades surcoreanas son los traidores que no hacen caso del destino de la nacion.
